Title: Requires all medical facilities to have immediate access to every single-occupancy bathroom where a patient could be in an emergency
Summary: Requires all medical facilities to have immediate access to every single-occupancy bathroom where a patient could be in an emergency.
LawCode: Add ยง2832, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring all medical facilities to be able to access every single-occupancy bathroom where a patient could be in an emergency
